display_name:
[Power of Pride and Hope] Super Saiyan God SS Vegeta & 
Super Saiyan Trunks (Future)

kit.leader_skill: "Bond of Parent and Child" or "Future Saga" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional Ki +1 and HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the "Battle of Fate" Category

super_attack.name: Rage of Our Warrior Race (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy

ultra_super_attack.name: Gamma Burst Flash & Burning Attack (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Raises allies' ATK & DEF by 5% in battle

passive_skill.name: Father and Son Protecting the Future
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Bond of Parent and Child" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry: (Once) Ki +7 and DEF 100% up for 5 turns; (Once) Damage reduction rate 10% up and randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres for 3 turns; (Once) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) Guards all attacks; (Once) Damage reduction rate 20% up; (Once) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; When attacking with 18 or more Ki: Launches an additional Super Attack; When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki: "Bond of Parent and Child" Category allies' DEF 30% up; For every attack received or evaded: (Forever) Ki +2 (up to +10); (Forever) ATK 20% up (up to 100%); (Forever) DEF 50% up (up to 150%); (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up (up to 50%); As the 1st attacker in a turn: ATK & DEF 200% up; Damage reduction rate 30% up

lines.text: Ki +7 and DEF 100% up for 5 turns
lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Bond of Parent and Child" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry

lines.text: Damage reduction rate 10% up and randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres for 3 turns

lines.context: Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Bond of Parent and Child" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry
When attacking with 18 or more Ki

lines.text: "Bond of Parent and Child" Category allies' DEF 30% up
lines.context: When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki

lines.text: Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up (up to 50%)
lines.context: For every attack received or evaded

active_skill.name: Father-Son Galick Gun
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily,; causes ultimate damage to enemy; Within the turn activated, all attacks become; critical hits; Raises all allies' DEF by 20% for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when all allies attacking in the same turn are "Future Saga" Category characters starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle Or when HP is 50% or less starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only)
